actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to repeal section 89 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 (relating to rules for coverage and benefits under certain employee benefit plans).

summary.text: Repeals provisions of the Tax Reform Act of 1986 and the Technical and Miscellaneous Revenue Act of 1988 that establish nondiscrimination requirements for coverage and benefits under certain statutory employee benefit plans. (The consequence is the repeal of section 89 of the Internal Revenue Code.) Restores prior law under the Code.

titles.title: A bill to repeal section 89 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 (relating to rules for coverage and benefits under certain employee benefit plans).
